Package controllers

Class Controller_NearestNeighborApprox

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.Controller_NearestNeighborApprox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IController, java.io.Serializable
    public class Controller_NearestNeighborApprox
extends java.lang.Object
implements IController, java.io.Serializable
    QWOP controller which takes known sample trajectories, and tries to pick the best match to use for feedback during a run.
    Author:
    matt
    See Also:

      • Controller_NearestNeighborApprox

        public Controller_NearestNeighborApprox​(java.util.List<java.io.File> files)
        Create a trajectory library-type controller by providing a list of files to look through.
        Parameters:
        files - A list of .TFRecord SequenceExample files from which to load trajectories.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Files are not successfully loaded.

        runnerScaling - Scaling from world coordinates to window pixel coordinates.
